con:interface.name: Shoprocket API
con:interface.con:description: The Shoprocket API. This is the private API and is under rapid development. Endpoints may change be added to and removed. Also some endpoits are symbolic in nature such as session and voucher which at this moment in time reside in the cart end point. By the they are promoted to the public API they will most likely be under the session voucher methods and not the cart. This is one example of the things you may find whilst using the private API's. If you do not have a partner key email support@shoprocket.co.uk
